org.taverna.server.master.interfaces

Interface TavernaRun

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteRunDelegate

    public interface TavernaRun
extends Serializable
    The interface to a taverna workflow run, or "run" for short.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a listener to the run.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns:
        The identifier of the run.

      • getWorkflow

        Workflow getWorkflow()
        Returns:
        What was this run was create to execute.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of the run.

      • setName

        void setName(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The new name of the run. May be truncated.

      • getInputBaclavaFile

        String getInputBaclavaFile()
        Returns:
        The name of the Baclava file to use for all inputs, or null if no Baclava file is set.

      • setInputBaclavaFile

        void setInputBaclavaFile(String filename)
                  throws FilesystemAccessException,
                         BadStateChangeException
        Sets the Baclava file to use for all inputs. This overrides the use of individual inputs.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to use. Must not start with a / or contain any .. segments. Will be interpreted relative to the run's working directory.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If the filename is invalid.
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow is not in the Initialized state.

      • getInputs

        List<Input> getInputs()
        Returns:
        The list of input assignments.

      • makeInput

        Input makeInput(String name)
         throws BadStateChangeException
        Create an input assignment.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the port that this will be an input for.
        Returns:
        The assignment reference.
        Throws:
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow is not in the Initialized state.

      • getOutputBaclavaFile

        String getOutputBaclavaFile()
        Returns:
        The file (relative to the working directory) to write the outputs of the run to as a Baclava document, or null if they are to be written to non-Baclava files in a directory called out.

      • setOutputBaclavaFile

        void setOutputBaclavaFile(String filename)
                   throws FilesystemAccessException,
                          BadStateChangeException
        Sets where the output of the run is to be written to. This will cause the output to be generated as a Baclava document, rather than a collection of individual non-Baclava files in the subdirectory of the working directory called out.
        Parameters:
        filename - Where to write the Baclava file (or null to cause the output to be written to individual files); overwrites any previous setting of this value.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If the filename starts with a / or contains a .. segment.
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow is not in the Initialized state.

      • getExpiry

        Date getExpiry()
        Returns:
        When this run will expire, becoming eligible for automated deletion.

      • setExpiry

        void setExpiry(Date d)
        Set when this run will expire.
        Parameters:
        d - Expiry time. Deletion will happen some time after that.

      • getStatus

        Status getStatus()
        Returns:
        The current status of the run.

      • setStatus

        String setStatus(Status s)
          throws BadStateChangeException
        Set the status of the run, which should cause it to move into the given state. This may cause some significant changes.
        Parameters:
        s - The state to try to change to.
        Returns:
        null, or a string describing the incomplete state change if the operation has internally timed out.
        Throws:
        BadStateChangeException - If the change to the given state is impossible.

      • getWorkingDirectory

        Directory getWorkingDirectory()
                       throws FilesystemAccessException
        Returns:
        Handle to the main working directory of the run.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException

      • getListeners

        List<Listener> getListeners()
        Returns:
        The list of listener instances attached to the run.

      • addListener

        void addListener(Listener listener)
        Add a listener to the run.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.

      • getSecurityContext

        TavernaSecurityContext getSecurityContext()
        Returns:
        The security context structure for this run.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
      throws NoDestroyException
        Kill off this run, removing all resources which it consumes.
        Throws:
        NoDestroyException - If the destruction failed.

      • getCreationTimestamp

        Date getCreationTimestamp()
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was created.

      • getStartTimestamp

        Date getStartTimestamp()
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was started, or null if it has never been started.

      • getFinishTimestamp

        Date getFinishTimestamp()
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was found to have finished, or null if it has never finished (either still running or never started).

      • ping

        void ping()
   throws UnknownRunException
        Test if this run is really there.

        Implementation note: Used to test communication fabrics, etc. so implementations of this interface that do not delegate to another object should do nothing.

        Throws:
        UnknownRunException - If things fail.

      • getGenerateProvenance

        boolean getGenerateProvenance()
        Returns:
        whether the run generates provenance data

      • setGenerateProvenance

        void setGenerateProvenance(boolean generateProvenance)
        Parameters:
        generateProvenance - whether the run generates provenance data
